# 牛客 B 端产品经理求职攻略 2021~2022

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/niuke-b-duan-chanpin-jingli-qiuzhi-gonglve-2021-2022
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/niuke-b-duan-chanpin-jingli-qiuzhi-gonglve-2021-2022
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install niuke-b-duan-chanpin-jingli-qiuzhi-gonglve-2021-2022
niuke-b-duan-chanpin-jingli-qiuzhi-gonglve-2021-2022 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g niuke-b-duan-chanpin-jingli-qiuzhi-gonglve-erlingeryi-erlingerer
niuke-b-duan-chanpin-jingli-qiuzhi-gonglve-erlingeryi-erlingerer <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
